content: Lakeview Resort: 200 rooms, spa facility, lakeside view. Popular for weddings.
metadata: Location code: LV-RES, region: North District, high-season: June-Aug

content: Urban Plaza Hotel: 150 rooms, rooftop bar, business-friendly with conference hall.
metadata: Location code: UP-HOT, city center location, frequent corporate bookings

content: Beachside Inn: 80 rooms, direct beach access. Summer family packages available.
metadata: Location code: BS-INN, region: Coastal, loyalty points booster in August

content: Mountain Lodge: 50 cabins, fireplace in each unit, hiking trails nearby.
metadata: Location code: MT-LOD, winter special for skiing, closed in off-season April-May

content: Airport Express Suites: 90 suites, shuttle service to major airline terminals.
metadata: Location code: AE-SUI, business traveler focus, partnership with local airline
